description: Identifier of the currently active attachment version for the association. Likely references a versioned attachment record; confirm with SME.
Primary key for the association between a business entity (e.g., asset, vehicle, work order) and an attachment record. Enables many-to-one linkage of files to objects.
Identifier of the underlying attachment (document/file) independent of version. Groups all versions under the same attachment; confirm with SME.
